issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h4.Problem
A DefaultImage is showed even after opening a view for 4-5 times then the URL images finally start to appear.

h4.Tested on
Emulator HVGA
Device 1: G-Tablet w/ WIFI
Device 2: HTC Dream w/ WIFI

h4.Console output

h4.Repro sequence
Although this is an intermittent issue, can be more reliable reproduce by setting the DefaultImage property.  
{code:title=app.js}
var win = Ti.UI.createWindow({
	backgroundColor:'white'
});

var productsTable = Titanium.UI.createTableView({
	left: 0,
	top: 0,
	width: 400,
	height: 300,
	backgroundColor: '#ffffff'
});

var rows = [];

for (var i = 0; i < 5; i++) {

	var row = Titanium.UI.createTableViewRow({
		height: 130,
		backgroundSelectedColor: '#f6abc7'
	});

        //Pointed to a real URL image ...
	var myImageURL = 'http://blog.skyblox.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/05/appcelerator.jpg';

	var image1 = Titanium.UI.createImageView({
		left: 10,
		width: 78,
		height: 78,
		top: 10,
                //If defaultImage is commented out probability to load URL image is higher
		defaultImage: 'KS_nav_views.png',//Locally stored
		image: myImageURL
	});

	row.add(image1);

	rows.push(row);
}

productsTable.setData(rows);

win.add(productsTable);

win.open();
{code}

h4.Workaround
Use an URL image tiny enough to get it displayed sooner, as it looks like is being rendered on the first times.

h4.Associated HD
An ENT customer relies on this, http://appc.me/c/APP-296374
fields.summary: Android: Remote image does not show when defaultImage is defined
fields.environment:
Product: Mobile
    Titanium SDK: Mobile 1.7.1
    Platform OS: Android
    Platform OS Version: 2.1

comments.body: Changing priority/severity back to original value. Customer priority is still IMMEDIATE. BestFit would like this fixed ASAP. It's hanging up two of their projects
See if I can figure out what's going on.

As well as the test in this ticket, we should also verify these tests in KitchenSink:
* Base UI > Views > Table Views > Layout 2
* Platform > XML + RSS
* Mashups > YQL > YQL + Flickr
* Mashups > Facebook > Query

You'll also want to make sure you're clearing the image cache between test runs, which can be done with adb like so:
{code}
$ adb shell rm /sdcard/$APPID/remote-image-cache/*
{code}

Where $APPID is the app's id.

Tested with 1.8.0.v20110819142548
iPhone 4.3.4
iPad2 4.3.2
Motorola Xoom 3.2
Nexus One 2.2.2

Tested with 1.7.3.v20110928185013 with
Hero 2.1
Galaxy Tab 3.1
Emulator 2.3
